participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys personal expression and has a strong attachment to food.
participant_1.background: I like to be alone, but I love my baby. I love watching Silicon Valley and making videos for my YouTube channel. I have never been to the west coast of the United States. I watch Game of Thrones even though my parents don't approve of it. I'm not sure, but I can hear the difference between a C and a G.

participant_2.name: Ava
participant_2.personality: Confident and expressive, values self-sufficiency and enjoys fun and quirky hobbies.
participant_2.background: I'm a self-sufficient person who can take care of myself. As a child, I won a national spelling bee. I believe in aliens. I like to dye my hair bright colors because it's a way to express myself and my love of nature. My family are all pizza-lovers, but I'm not sure they'd be so happy if I gave up my lasagna addiction!

content.text: I think my hair looks so much better with my new color.
I love that you dyed your hair. I have done it a few times but I usually go back to my natural color.
I love the freedom of doing what I want with my hair.
I agree, it's definitely a fun way to express yourself. I'm pretty sure my family would kill me if I gave up lasagna though, haha.
I love lasagna too! It's one of my favorite foods.
I love a good meat lasagna with lots of ricotta and mozzarella cheese.
That sounds delicious! I love it when there's a lot of cheese in lasagna.
Me too! It's the best part.
I'm glad we agree on something!
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who shares your love of food.
For sure! It makes life more enjoyable
